name: Elevator Control
description:
A very simple game for my son. 

Just click the floor label to control the elevator to pick up people waiting and send them to the floor with the same color. 

Once a floor is full, game over.

The faster you send a person, the more score you earn.

There is also a WebGL version here: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-166114
